text: Actress Debra Messing seems to be laughing in the face of ageing ; at 50 years old, the starlet's skin appears just as smooth and wrinkle - free as it did 20 years ago. And now Messing is finally revealing her skincare secrets to the world, opening up about how she stays looking so young year after year.
